original: Brogren, Sven Kristian August, major, Eksjö, f. 8/6/87 i Husby, Kopparb. 1., av lantbr :dir. Carl Fredrik August B. o. Anna Sophia Kihlström. G. 12 m. Clara Bothén. Barn: Maja-Greta f. 13, g. m. dir. S. Löwenadler, Cail-cutta, Märta 16, g. m. kapt. v. I. 12 G. Hammar, Eksjö, Stina 20, g. m. kapt. v. Flygv. T. Norlin, Sthlm. — Stud: ex. i Linköp. 05, off :ex. 07. Und:löjtn. v. Kalmar reg. 07, und:intend. v. intend:-kåren 12, intend. 13, kapt. 15, reg:-intend. v. Kalmar reg. 15, v. Jönköp.-Kalmar reg. 28, major i armén 34. Styr:led. o. kassadir. i Hässleby sa-nat., v. ordf. i styrelsen f. System A-B i Jönköp., led. av styr. f. A-B Skånska Bankens avd:kont. i Eksjö, konsulent h. Fören. f. restaurantkontr. i Ö. Mellansv:e s^ed. 39. Medl. av Frimurareorden o. S. H. T. RSO 28.
translated: Brogren, Sven Kristian August, Major, Eksjö, born June 8th, 1887 in Husby, Kopparberg County, the son of farmer director Carl Fredrik August B. and Anna Sophia Kihlström. Married for 12 years to Clara Bothén. Children: Maja-Greta, born in 1913, married to director S. Löwenadler in Calcutta; Märta, born in 1916, married to Captain v. I. G. Hammar in Eksjö; Stina, born in 1920, married to Captain v. Flygv. T. Norlin in Stockholm. Studied in Linköping, graduated in 1905, and achieved officer status in 1907. Became Second Lieutenant in Kalmar Regiment in 1907, Intendant of the Intendant Corps in 1912 and Captain in 1915. Became Intendant of the Kalmar Regiment in 1915, then worked for the Jönköping-Kalmar Regiment in 1928 before becoming a Major in the army in 1934. Was on the board of directors and treasurer for Hässleby sanatorium, served as vice-chair of the board for System AB in Jönköping, was a board member for the Skånska Bankens Ltd. branch in Eksjö, and worked as a consultant for the Association for Restaurant Control in Central Sweden in 1939. He was a member of the Freemasons and SHT and received RSO in 1928.
